fields.value: Replication Data for: Spatial-temporal clustering analysis of yaws on Lihir Island, Papua New Guinea  to enhance planning and implementation of eradication programs

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset and the accompanying code allow users to replicate an analysis of the spatial-temporal clustering of yaws on Lihir Island, Papua New Guinea.

files.description: This file lists information on all outpatient visits to Lihir Medical Centre. These visits are the underlying "population" in the analyses that use passively detected incident yaws cases.
files.label: AllOutpatient_LMC.tab

dataFile.description: This file lists information on all outpatient visits to Lihir Medical Centre. These visits are the underlying "population" in the analyses that use passively detected incident yaws cases.

files.description: This R code replicates the part of the analysis that using SaTScan to detect spatial-only clusters of serologically or PCR-confirmed yaws in 7 biannual active case finding surveys.
files.label: clustering_yaws_active.R

dataFile.description: This R code replicates the part of the analysis that using SaTScan to detect spatial-only clusters of serologically or PCR-confirmed yaws in 7 biannual active case finding surveys.

files.description: This R code replicates the part of the analysis that using SaTScan to detect spatial-temporal clusters of yaws using about 11 years of clinical records from Lihir Medical Centre.
files.label: clustering_yaws_passive.R

dataFile.description: This R code replicates the part of the analysis that using SaTScan to detect spatial-temporal clusters of yaws using about 11 years of clinical records from Lihir Medical Centre.

files.description: This file lists the distances between each pair of Lihir villages. This is the spatial data that underpins all of the SaTScan analyses.
files.label: LihirVillageRoadDistances.tab

dataFile.description: This file lists the distances between each pair of Lihir villages. This is the spatial data that underpins all of the SaTScan analyses.

files.description: This file lists the primary school attendance area for each Lihir village.
files.label: LihirVillagesPrimarySchools.tab

dataFile.description: This file lists the primary school attendance area for each Lihir village.

files.description: This R code replicates the part of the analysis that assesses whether incident yaws cases cluster within primary school attendance areas.
files.label: primary_schools_yaws.R

dataFile.description: This R code replicates the part of the analysis that assesses whether incident yaws cases cluster within primary school attendance areas.

files.description: This file includes data on serologically confirmed yaws cases and number of individuals screened for surveys 1 through 7.
files.label: R1R7SeroActiveScreen.tab

dataFile.description: This file includes data on serologically confirmed yaws cases and number of individuals screened for surveys 1 through 7.

files.description: This file includes data on PCR-confirmed yaws cases and number of individuals screened for surveys 3 through 7.
files.label: R3R7PCRActiveScreen.tab

dataFile.description: This file includes data on PCR-confirmed yaws cases and number of individuals screened for surveys 3 through 7.

files.description: This file lists information on all yaws diagnoses among outpatients at Lihir Medical Centre.
files.label: YawsCases_LMC.tab

dataFile.description: This file lists information on all yaws diagnoses among outpatients at Lihir Medical Centre.
